sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.EmailClientTemplateEvaluator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>EmailClientTemplateEvaluator</name> <script><![CDATA[var EmailClientTemplateEvaluator = Class.create(); EmailClientTemplateEvaluator.prototype = { initialize: function() { }, getRecipientsForReplyEmails: function(sourceEmail) { var user = sourceEmail.getValue("user"); var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user"); return user && gr.get(user) ? "user_id" : "user"; }, type: 'EmailClientTemplateEvaluator' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-10-15 18:11:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5af9e51f53313110c0d8ddeeff7b1293</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>EmailClientTemplateEvaluator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Email Client Template" source="com.glide.email_client_template">e6937c243c31311068bcf327dfe37f68</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5af9e51f53313110c0d8ddeeff7b1293</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-15 18:20:29</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
